title: links for 2006-01-20
content:
• Life in Text Mode :: Phil! Gregory
    "I primarily use Unix-based computers, mostly Linux. On those computers, I live in text mode."
    (tags: hacks text linux sysadmin)
  • b-spirit.com - RSS at DaimlerChrysler
    "Site visitors can subscribe to a menu of RSS feeds including feeds for the entire site or specific channels."
    (tags: rss hackingfeeds syndication chrysler jeep dodge)
  • vrypan|net|log Â» del.icio.us as feed manager
    This sounds like a really good way to build Reading Lists for newsRiver
    (tags: rss opml syndication readinglists)
  • WorldWatch - August 21, 2005 - Gaza and the Israeli Settlers - The Ornery American
    'Sharon is willing to risk ending his own career for real and important benefits to Israel over the long term. That's how I define "Statesman."'
    (tags: israel politics orsonscottcard)
  • WorldWatch - January 8, 2006 - Creation and Evolution in the Schools - The Ornery American
    'Yes, there are problems with the Darwinian model. But those problems are questions. "Intelligent design" is an answer, and you have no evidence at all for that.'
    (tags: religion creationism id intelligentdesign science politics)
  • Epeus' epigone - Kevin Marks weblog - Live TV is dead, and we're noticing the smell
    (tags: video tv television entertainment podcasting podcasts ipod quicktime)
  • NewsRiver: Home
    "Dave mentioned that someone asked for an AJAX interface to river of news. "
    (tags: ajax newsriver)
  • A life online: living decentralised (Mercurytide)
    "As the computing world becomes more and more decentralised, people are realising more and more ways to free themselves from a single PC, work socially, and live a life online."
    (tags: web20 decentralization)
